original_text: Then Moses and Aaron fell on their faces before all the assembly of the congregation of the people of Israel.
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중 앞에서 엎드린지라

sentences.original_text: Then Moses and Aaron fell on their faces
sentences.korean_translation: 이에 모세와 아론은 얼굴을 땅에 대고 엎드렸습니다

sentences.original_text: before all the assembly of the congregation of the people of Israel.
